function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive indirect effects of COVID-19 on the environment","Impact":"Potential complacency in addressing ongoing environmental issues","Mitigation":"Consistent monitoring and action to address environmental concerns","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Government and environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Negative indirect effects of COVID-19 on the environment","Impact":"Potential increase in waste and reduction in recycling","Mitigation":"Campaigns to promote recycling and waste reduction","Technologies":"Waste management technology","People":"General population, waste management personnel","Owner":"Government, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Decrease in GHG emissions during a short period","Impact":"Potential overreliance on temporary solutions","Mitigation":"Investment in long-term sustainable environmental strategies","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies","People":"General population, environmental policy makers","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"}]}
